To find products, they go to one place; for services, they go to several others; and for healthcare, a few more. In Colombia, in average, a person must visit or consult more than seven places per year to meet the needs of their pets.

We built a digital platform where users donât have to go anywhere else to meet said needs. With two main sections; products and services. In the products section, we have more than 4,000 references (among which you can find most of the brands of food, snacks, medicines, accessories and others). All of the above delivered straight to your home and with the flexibility of choosing the date and time on and at which you wish to receive the order, including same-day deliveries for the main cities and accepting all payment methods, both online and cash on delivery.
generated_description:
**Company Overview: LAIKA**

LAIKA is a pioneering online platform for pet supplies tailored for Latin America, particularly Colombia. Founded in 2018 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S19, its mission is straightforward: to be the go-to online one-stop shop for all pet owners. With over 4,000 products available, ranging from food and snacks to medical supplies and accessories, LAIKA strives to streamline the shopping experience for pet owners.

**The Problem LAIKA Solves**

Traditionally, pet owners face a cumbersome process when trying to meet their pets' needs. Reports show that on average, a Colombian pet owner has to navigate to over seven different places in a year to purchase products, seek services, and access healthcare for their pets. This convoluted experience is precisely what LAIKA seeks to remedy by consolidating everything into a single digital platform.

**Platform Features**

LAIKA's website features two primary categories: products and services. In the product section, customers can explore a wide array of over 4,000 items, including all the leading brands. The services section offers more than 17 unique services that cover health, beauty, and entertainment for pets—all conveniently delivered to your doorstep. Users enjoy flexibility by choosing their preferred delivery date and time, with options for same-day delivery in major cities. Plus, there’s a multitude of payment methods available, including cash on delivery.

**Growing the Team and Community**

Based in Bogotá, Colombia, LAIKA operates with a dedicated team of approximately 500 employees and is backed by the Group Partner, Nan. This committed workforce is crucial for managing operations and providing the best customer experience.

**Unique Selling Proposition**

LAIKA’s unique approach lies in its integration of both e-commerce and offline services, creating an ecosystem where pet needs are addressed holistically. This model not only saves time for pet owners but also builds community trust in pet care, making LAIKA a pivotal player in the pet supply market across Latin America.

**Contact and Further Information**

Interested pet owners can access LAIKA’s services through their official website at [laika.com.co](https://laika.com.co/). The business is set on redefining pet care in LATAM, reinforcing its status as a reliable partner in the lives of pets and their owners. If you're looking for reliability, convenience, and everything in one place for your peludos, LAIKA is worth checking out.
